member.name: T:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState
member.summary: Enumeration for the download states.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.None
member.summary: Unhandled exception.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Ready
member.summary: Ready to download.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Queued
member.summary: Queued to start downloading.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Downloading
member.summary: Currently downloading.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Paused
member.summary: The download is paused and can be resumed.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Completed
member.summary: The download is completed.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Failed
member.summary: The download failed.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.DownloadState.Canceled
member.summary: A user canceled the download request.

member.name: T:Tizen.Content.Download.NetworkType
member.summary: Enumeration for the network types.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NetworkType.DataNetwork
member.summary: The download is available through data network.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NetworkType.Wifi
member.summary: The download is available through Wi-Fi.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NetworkType.WifiDirect
member.summary: The download is available through Wi-Fi Direct.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NetworkType.All
member.summary: The download is available either through data network or Wi-Fi.

member.name: T:Tizen.Content.Download.NotificationType
member.summary: Enumeration for the notification types.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NotificationType.None
member.summary: Do not register notification.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NotificationType.CompleteOnly
member.summary: Completion notification for success state and failed state.

member.name: F:Tizen.Content.Download.NotificationType.All
member.summary: All download notifications for ongoing state, success state, and failed state.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.DownloadedPath
member.summary: The absolute path where the file will be downloaded. If you try to get this property value before calling Start(), an empty string is returned.
member.remarks: Returns an empty string if the download is not completed or if a state has not yet changed to completed or if any other error occurs.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.ContentName
member.summary: The content name of the downloaded file. This can be defined with reference of the HTTP response header data. The content name can be received when the HTTP response header is received. If you try to get this property value before calling Start(), an empty string is returned.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.ContentSize
member.summary: The total size of the downloaded content. This information is received from the server. If the server does not send the total size of the content, the content size is set to zero. If you try to get this property value before calling Start(), 0 is returned.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.HttpStatus
member.summary: The HTTP status code when a download exception occurs. If you try to get this property value before calling Start(), 0 is returned.
member.remarks: The state of the download request must be DownlodState.Failed.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.ETagValue
member.summary: The ETag value from the HTTP response header when making a HTTP request for resume. If you try to get this property value before calling Start() or if any other error occurs, an empty string is returned.
member.remarks: The ETag value is either available or not dependent on the web server. If not available, then, on getting the property, a null value is returned. After the download is started, it can get the ETag value.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.NotificationProperties
member.summary: Contains properties required for creating download notifications.
member.remarks: When the notification message is clicked, the action taken by the system is decided by the application control properties of the NotificationProperties instance. If the app control is not set, the following default operation is executed when the notification message is clicked: 1) The download completed state - the viewer application is executed according to the extension name of the downloaded content. 2) The download failed state and ongoing state - the client application is executed. This property should be set before calling Start().

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.TemporaryPath
member.summary: The full path of the temporary file stores the downloaded content.
member.remarks: The download state must be one of the states after downloading.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.Url
member.summary: The URL to download.
member.remarks: Should be set before calling Start(). If you try to get this property value before setting or if any other error occurs, an empty string is returned.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.AllowedNetworkType
member.summary: The allowed network type for downloading the file. The file will be downloaded only under the allowed network. If you try to get this property value before setting or if any other error occurs, the default value NetworkType All is returned.
member.remarks: Should be set before calling Start().
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.
Thrown when feature is not supported.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.DestinationPath
member.summary: The file will be downloaded to the set the destination file path. The downloaded file is saved to an auto-generated file name in the destination. If the destination is not specified, the file will be downloaded to the default storage. If you try to get this property value before setting or if any other error occurs, an empty string is returned.
member.remarks: Should be set before calling Start().
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.FileName
member.summary: The file will be saved in the specified destination or the default storage with the set file name. If the file name is not specified, the downloaded file will be saved with an auto-generated file name in the destination. If you try to get this property value before setting or if any other error occurs, an empty string is returned.
member.remarks: Should be set before calling Start().
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.AutoDownload
member.summary: Enables or disables auto download. If this option is enabled, the previous downloading item is restarted automatically as soon as the download daemon is restarted. The download progress continues after the client process is terminated. If you try to get this property value before setting, the default value false is returned.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: P:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.HttpHeaders
member.summary: The HTTP header field and value pairs to the download request. The HTTP header <field,value> pair is the <key,value> pair in the dictionary HttpHeaders. The given HTTP header field will be included with the HTTP request of the download request. If you try to get this property value before setting, an empty dictionary is returned.
member.remarks: HTTP header fields should be set before calling Start(). HTTP header fields can be removed before calling Start().

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.SetTemporaryFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the directory path of a temporary file used in a previous download request. This is only useful when resuming download to make the HTTP request header at the client side. Otherwise, the path is ignored.
member.remarks: If the ETag value is not present in the download database, it is not useful to set the temporary file path. When resuming the download request, the data is attached at the end of this temporary file.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.Start
member.summary: Starts or resumes the download. Starts to download the current URL, or resumes the download if paused.
member.remarks: The URL is the mandatory information to start the download.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the download request.
member.remarks: The paused download request can be restarted with Start() or canceled with Cancel().
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the download request.
member.remarks: The canceled download can be restarted with Start().
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Content.Download.Request.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by the Request class.
member.remarks: After calling this method, the download request related data exists in the download database for a certain period of time. Within that time, it is possible to use other APIs with this data.
member.exception: Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid parameter.
Thrown when it is failed due to an invalid operation.
Thrown when a permission is denied.

member.summary: Deletes the corresponding download request.
